label: 治部省
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
見出し読み: じぶしょうじぶしょう
説明文: The Civil Affairs Ministry was entrusted by the Code with the conduct of the state's relations with Buddhist temples, monks, and nuns; with hospitality to foreign embgassies; and with the provision of Court music (p. 809).
